channel.title: Tom's Cache Suite Help [FIXED]
channel.description:
Well, I recently downloaded an edited version of Tom's Cache Suite (removing size limitations) and I can't load up the cache? I've never used the tool before but I still can't seem to figure it out.
When I click open cache the directory is desktop-server-client-cache I click ok and the thing freezes? Could I have some basic instructions on loading the cache please.
Thank's
EDIT: Well after a long time the cache loaded. My computer was running WAY to many processes (considering I only have 2g ram) to load a 180mb cache instantly.

item.title: Tom's Cache Suite Help [FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

It takes a while to load but if it doesn’t that means your cache is corrupted.

Read full topic
